surfaces.notes: Creation and management of the pre-flight context packaging kit, including documentation updates and dry-run validation.
Development of a checklist and script to verify agent availability and MCP health, with evidence capture.
Defining JSON schema for telemetry and cost, including documentation and validation scripts.
Creation of security review templates and trackers, with integration into SPEC.md and evidence.
Implementation of SOP and automated reporting for evidence size limits, including documentation and script execution.
Development of a playbook for handling degraded agent participation, with documentation and simulation.

tests: Backfill of past runs from evidence
surfaces.notes: Defining and tracking adoption metrics for /speckit.tasks executions, including dashboard and documentation.
QA activities to validate telemetry schema compliance and alert routing, with report generation and evidence.

tests: Cost telemetry vs schema baseline comparison
surfaces.notes: Consolidation of audit information, including consensus verdict and cost reconciliation, with archiving.
Underlying infrastructure for storing evidence, cost summaries, consensus data, and output files.

dependencies: QA environment mirroring production telemetry (for T8)
ACE bulletin update for prompt injectors (T1 cross-team touchpoint)
MCP infrastructure team for startup thresholds (T2 cross-team touchpoint)
Security Guild weekly stand-up (T4 cross-team touchpoint)
Evidence custodians for archival retention (T5 cross-team touchpoint)
Automation duty rotation for sign-off (T6 cross-team touchpoint)
PMO for adoption cadence (T7 cross-team touchpoint)
Telemetry Ops for alert routing confirmation (T8 cross-team touchpoint)
Finance + Spec-Kit maintainers for approval signatures (T9 cross-team touchpoint)

quote>
quote> Task:
quote> Based on the plan for SPEC SPEC-KIT-900, decompose the workload into specific, i
mplementable tasks. Each task should represent concrete work to build the features desc
ribed in the SPEC.
quote>
quote> Produce JSON:
quote> {
quote>   "stage": "spec-tasks",
quote>   "prompt_version": "${PROMPT_VERSION}",
quote>   "agent": "claude",
quote>   "model": "${MODEL_ID}",
quote>   "model_release": "${MODEL_RELEASE}",
quote>   "reasoning_mode": "${REASONING_MODE}",
quote>   "tasks": [ { "order": number, "task_id": string, "title": string, "status": st
ring, "validation_step": string, "artifact": string, "notes": string } ],
quote>   "acceptance_coverage": [ string ],
quote>   "followups": [ string ]
quote> }
quote> Ensure acceptance mapping coverage and include lint/tests. Return the JSON as yo
ur final response. The system will handle storage.'; echo ''
